1370: bertrade was born in Davids hof in 1370.
Got married to Sylof at age 26 in 1370.
1373: Gave birth to Amelgeir in 1373 at age 29.
1375: Gave birth to Ghela in 1375 at age 31.
1376: Gave birth to Heilsota in 1376 at age 32.
1378: Gave birth to Nannen in 1378 at age 34.
1380: Gave birth to Betten in 1380 at age 36.
1382: Lost daughter Ghela when Ghela was 8 years old.
1383: Gave birth to Ermegardis in 1383 at age 39.
Lost daughter Amelgeir when Amelgeir was 11 years old.
1384: Gave birth to Folqui in 1384 at age 40.
